description: LUSD token can be deposited and withdrawn thru SWIFT, Ethereum USDT and Tron USDT networks
LEUR token can be deposited and withdrawn thru SWIFT
LETH token can be deposited and withdrawn thru Ethereum (ETH) and Polygon (WETH) networks
BTC can be deposited and withdrawn thru Bitcoin, Ethereum (WBTC) and Polygon (WBTC) networks
Gold warehouse receipts can be deposited and withdrawn in bank office only
Gold on metal account can be deposited and withdrawn in bank office only
